EmailTemplate.name: Facilitator Provisionally Accepted- Existing Volunteer
EmailTemplate.subject: You have been selected to continue to the next steps in our Team Facilitator Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.FirstName__c} {!Account.LastName__c},
We are excited to let you know we have accepted you to our Team Facilitator Training Program. Graduation and acceptance as an Atlas Team Facilitator is still contingent on your completion of the training course, workshop, background check, and hands-on practicum.
Please review our Program Agreement form carefully and complete it (you will need to cut and paste the link below into a browser).
*Team Facilitator Program Agreement: https://www.tfaforms.com/4830464
Our Team Facilitators are the face of Atlas with our clients. We want to make sure you are committed to completing the training and working with our clients. We understand and appreciate your time and effort. In exchange, we are committed to providing significant educational and mentorship resources to ensure your success as a Team Facilitator.
Once we receive this form from you we will give you access to our online courses and get you going in the program.
As always, let us know any questions.
Best, Molly and Atlas Assistance Dogs
